channel.title: googleMaps plugin Tutorial 02: Zoom Level
channel.description: Discuss googleMaps plugin Tutorial 02: Zoom Level

item.title: Leanne says:
item.description: I've downloaded the latest googleMaps plug-in, but I'm having the same problem as gerardo.garcia in that zoom=?? isn't affecting the zoom level of the map when used with KML files. When you say this was updated in googleMaps v2.5.19 is that the version that is compatible with Joomla 2.5+? I am using 1.7, would upgrading Joomla fix this problem? Thanks, Leanne
item.dc:creator: Leanne

item.title: Urs says:
item.description: addoverview=0 found it in the version info, thx
item.dc:creator: Urs

item.title: Urs says:
item.description: Hey kksou, nice work of yours! One questioin: How do i switch off the overview map in the lower right hand corner? like u got it in the example above. thanks in advance for your reply. regards Urs
item.dc:creator: Urs

item.title: kksou says:
item.description: Hi Gerardo, Sorry for the late reply. Have just released googleMaps v2.5.19. Please try this latest version and let me know if zoom works with your KML files now. Regards, /kksou
item.dc:creator: kksou

item.title: gerardo.garcia says:
item.description: :sad: zoom does't seem work fine with kml files. I even tried with the example!
item.dc:creator: gerardo.garcia
